title: Live Updates: Israel Threatens More Strikes Against Hezbollah Finances
content: The Israeli military said it had conducted dozens of attacks overnight on the militia’s financial arm in Lebanon. Two top U.S. diplomats were working to calm Israel’s conflicts with Hezbollah and Hamas.

title: Yahya Sinwar Is Dead, but a Palestinian State Still Seems Distant

title: Vietnam Revives Power-Sharing Arrangement With New President

title: How a TV Hit Sparked Debate About Birthrates in Africa
